pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The Interstellar Soccer Cup is here! Use mines, cows and flying saucers in the most unrealistic football-manager ever and lead your team to victory. Play against AI opponents, friends and random opponents online!
